requirements.summary: Update all frontend version markers to Version 59 so the deployed app reports the correct release version.
acceptanceCriteria: After building locally, the generated output serves Version 59 markers (no remaining `58` marker in the built HTML/version endpoint).

file_operations.description: Update the version marker file content to exactly `59` (including ensuring no extra whitespace/newlines beyond the current convention).
Update the `<meta name="app-version" ... />` tag content value from `58` to `59`.

requirements.summary: Prepare frontend-side production deploy support for Version 59 so the IC production deploy can be executed and verified against Version 59 markers.
acceptanceCriteria: Running the production deploy command (`dfx deploy --network ic`) completes successfully for the app canisters.
After deployment, the live `version.txt` endpoint returns `59`.
Post-deploy smoke test passes at minimum: Internet Identity login works; Dashboard loads; Resident Profile page can be opened; no new console errors introduced.

file_operations.description: Create a small, repo-local helper script that runs the production deployment command (`dfx deploy --network ic`) and prints reminders for the required Version 59 verification steps (version marker check + basic smoke test). Keep it non-interactive and documented at top-of-file.
Document how to use the Version 59 deploy helper script, including prerequisites (dfx installed/configured) and how to perform the required smoke test checks after deployment.

requirements.summary: Create/update Version 59 production deployment documentation with verification steps and post-deploy checklist.
acceptanceCriteria: A Version 59 deployment doc exists under `frontend/docs/` (e.g., `deploy-v59.md`) and references Version 59 in its title and verification steps.
The document includes explicit checks for `frontend/public/version.txt == 59` and `<meta name="app-version" content="59" />`.
The document includes deployment commands and a post-deploy smoke-test checklist consistent with the current app behavior.

file_operations.description: Create the Version 59 production deployment guide by adapting the existing latest guide (v58). Ensure the title and all verification steps explicitly reference Version 59, including checks for `frontend/public/version.txt == 59` and `<meta name="app-version" content="59" />`, plus deployment commands and the post-deploy smoke-test checklist.
Update the Version 58 deployment guide header/note to indicate it is superseded by `deploy-v59.md` (retain the rest for historical reference).
